import {React, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import CommonSection from "../shared/CommonSection" import TourCard from "../shared/TourCard" import Newsletter from "../shared/Newsletter" import SearchBar from "../shared/SearchBar" import tourData from "../assets/data/tours" import { Col, Container } from 'reactstrap' import {Row} from 'reactstrap' const Tours = () => { const [pageCount, setPageCount] = useState(0) const [page,setPage] = useState(0) useEffect(()=>{ const pages = Math.ceil(5/4) setPageCount(pages) },[page]); return <>
{ tourData?.map(tour =>( ))}
{[...Array(pageCount).keys()].map(number=>( {number+1} ))}
} export default Tours
